mapper.sql: t.uuid uuid, t.zbid zbid, t.clid clid, t.clmc clmc, t.clzzs clzzs, t.bz bz, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_WL_XFZBXX_CL t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT
FROM YAGL_WL_XFZBXX_CL t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
ORDER BY ZBBM
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS uuid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_WL_XFZBXX_CL(uuid,zbid,clid,clmc,clzzs,bz,delete_flag,datasource,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{clid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{clmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{clzzs,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'N',#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE YAGL_WL_XFZBXX_CL t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.UUID = #{value}

INSERT INTO YAGL_WL_XFZBXX_CL(uuid,zbid,clid,clmc,clzzs,bz,delete_flag,datasource,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES
#{item.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} uuid,#{item.zbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zbid,#{item.clid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} clid,#{item.clmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} clmc,#{item.clzzs,jdbcType=DOUBLE} clzzs,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,'N' delete_flag,#{item.datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR} datasource,#{item.jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jdh,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE uuid = VALUES(uuid), zbid = VALUES(zbid), clid = VALUES(clid), clmc = VALUES(clmc), clzzs = VALUES(clzzs), bz = VALUES(bz), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), datasource = VALUES(datasource), jdh = VALUES(jdh), sjc = VALUES(sjc), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM YAGL_WL_XFZBXX_CL t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
